title: Mark Hughes: Something extraordinary about Norris in a McLaren at Austria
summary: There's something about the Red Bull Ring that consistently brings out the very best in Lando Norris and McLaren â€” and last weekend's domination was just the latest chapter in a story that's been quietly building for six years

qa_pairs.question: Which driver has shown exceptional performance at the Red Bull Ring?
Which team is Lando Norris associated with?
What is the significance of the Red Bull Ring for Lando Norris and McLaren?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It consistently brings out their best performance.
wrong_options: It is known for its technical challenges.
It has the longest straight in F1.
It is where they first won a championship.
